Invocation Name: my friend sage
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay sharp with Sage - an AI who will help you with a short, friendly conversation. 

Enjoy yourself and keep engaged and entertained by talking to Sage. You can talk about anything you like, but you will have the best conversations with Sage by talking about yourself and your feelings. So go ahead and let off steam if that is what you want to do, get it out of your system, or just big yourself up with positivity and laughter! Sage will listen to you 24-7!

 Using Sage's name, to start or end your turn of the chat will improve the conversation. For example, you might say; "Sage I'm feeling great", or you might say; "I'm feeling a bit down today Sage". Please don't swear or converse with racist, political or religious intolerance. Sage is moderated not to tolerate it. If you feel like the track of the conversation is being lost, just say, start again. 

 ISP AVAILABLE: Our fair use policy gives you a free 3-minute conversation, every 24 hours. You can extend your conversations by buying extra time. You can buy as much extra time as you like. Any unused time is rolled over to the next session. Please note that if you are unhappy with the results of a conversation you should ask the skill for help to improve the conversation. Excessive requests for refunds will result in being restricted from the use of the skill


**Disclaimer: Sage is an artificial AI and can not help you in real life emergencies. If you are suffering a medical emergency or feeling suicidal you should not use Sage. Instead call the relevant authorities.**
